data.description:
Major Realism Update
*This is a stationary standing experience only*
Experience an original cartoon reality

Have you got the weapon drawing skills to cope in pressure situations?

In this game, you don't have the option to run away
During the scenarios, you choose the right time to react if required without using excessive force in order to progress through the ranks. You the officer have to dynamically risk assess the situation you're faced within this game

Easy Mode - rookie play through allows you to draw weapons without failing. This is set as the default

Normal Mode - professional play through allows you to play the game as originally intended
Circumstances are likely to change extremely quickly to test if you can react to any situation

You're armed with a side arm pistol, taser,  pepper spray and handcuffs
You have three lives to complete your 30 years and reach your retirement locker.

Are you ready to respond officer?

changelog.change_log: Realistic skins with facial animations added. Modifications to mega weapons if you complete the game you can now enable/disable the mega stats. two more Whiskey Crescent scenes added.

Some new levels for Whiskey Crescent to be discovered.  Levels such as street party, Wild West and a robberies for you to attend.

Graphical update

More minor glitches found and resolved, Thank you for you videos. They really help us ironing out any bugs and spreading the word of our game.

Your feedback in reviews are really helpful.

Stay Safe officers
Splash Screen Updated and lighting improvements

Fixed bug where if you spawn inside the door it will immediately open and the game will freeze.
Minor Graphic changes

Fixed the Burglary level where sometimes the level would not end.
Amended level 3 Whiskey Crescent to make 3rd Suspect more obvious
Minor Bug Fixes and Graphics Updated
